forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High 16C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High 61F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Thunder possible. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Thunder possible. Low 53F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain diminishing to a few showers late. Low 53F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
